architectural_notes: Current issue likely caused by initial getChatrooms query being disabled/skipped on first load due to actor-ready timing; category-filter query runs and populates rooms only after user interaction.
known_issues: Live site: chatrooms list does not load on initial page load; rooms only appear after clicking/tapping a category tag to trigger category filter query.

existing_features.title: Ensure the Lobby page always triggers the initial unfiltered chatroom fetch (React Query key ['chatrooms']) automatically on first page load once the backend actor becomes available, without requiring the user to click/tap a category filter.

Prevent React Query from serving stale/incorrect empty results caused by empty/whitespace search/category variants by ensuring that empty search/category states resolve to the canonical ['chatrooms'] cache key and that any legacy empty-filter cache entries are removed/ignored before rendering the lobby list.

Harden Lobby loading/error rendering so the page cannot get stuck showing the loading spinner indefinitely; when fetching fails, the user must see a clear error state with a working Retry action that triggers the correct refetch for the currently active (unfiltered/search/category) query.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix lobby so initial unfiltered chatroom list loads automatically on first page load (no need to click category filter)

projectName: Fix lobby so unfiltered chatroom list loads automatically on first page load
